member.name: P:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.SelectionBehavior.IgnoreNullSelection
member.summary: Determines whether null selection (which usually occurs since the combobox is rebuilt or its list is refreshed) should be ignored. True by default.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.SelectionBehavior.OnSelectedItemChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the SelectedItem dependency property is changed. Updates the associated selector's SelectedItem with the new value.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.SelectionBehavior.OnSelectionChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the associated selector's selection is changed. Tries to assign it to the property. If it fails, updates the selector's with property's current value.

member.name: T:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.CalcQuick
member.summary: A class that allows you to quickly add calculation support for controls on a form, or usercontrol.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.CalcQuick.RegisterControlArray(System.Windows.Controls.Control[])
member.summary: A Virtual method that registers an array of controls as formula objects in this CalcQuick instance.

member.name: E:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.CalcQuick.TextChanged
member.summary: Have a textbox to handle the textchanged event

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.CalcQuick.RegisterControl(System.Windows.Controls.Control)
member.summary: Used to register a control as a calculation object in this CalcQuick instance.
member.remarks: To reference this calculation object from another calculation in this CalcQuick object, you use the Control.Name string. The value of this calculation object is bound to the Control.Text property.

member.name: T:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.ArrayCalcData
member.summary: Wrapper class for a double array.
member.remarks: Wrapper class for a double array that adds an extra column to hold the sum of each row, and also adds an extra row to hold the sum of the columns.

member.name: F:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.ArrayCalcData.rowSums
member.summary: vector holding the sum of the rows.

member.name: F:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.ArrayCalcData.colSums
member.summary: Vector holding the sum of the columns.

member.name: P:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.ArrayCalcData.Item(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of this ArrayCalcData object.
member.remarks: Since this class wraps a double array, the indexing is zero-based. But the ICalcData methods require one-based indexing by convention. So, one is added to the indexes when the ICalcData methods are called.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.ArrayCalcData.#ctor(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Wraps the double array with an extra row and column that holds calculated sums.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.ArrayCalcData.GetValueRowCol(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value into either the double array or column vector or row vector.
member.remarks: By convention, ICalcData uses one-based indexes.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.ArrayCalcData.SetValueRowCol(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the value into either the double array or column vector or row vector.
member.remarks:
This setter raises the ICalcData.ValueChanged event which is listened to by the CalcEngine to manage the calculations.
By convention, ICalcData uses one-based indexes.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.Data.ShowObject
member.summary: Displays the ArrayCalcData values in a TextBox.

member.name: M:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.Data.FindFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Finds a file of the given name in the current directory or sibling "Data" directory. If file is not found, the parent folder is checked until the file is found. This method is used by our samples when they load data from a separate "Data" folder.
member.returns: The full path of the file that was found; an empty string is returned if file is not found.

member.name: T:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:syncfusion.calculatedemos.wpf.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
